title: My game won't open
body:
Hello!  I'm sorry if I should post it in another corner of the discussion but this is the first time I'm writing a discussion.

So I really need some help with my game.
Yesterday my game worked just fine but whenever I want to open it today I just get the message "another instance  of the launcher is running. Do you want to terminate it?" even though there is no other instance. If I click yes, bugsplat opens and tells me that this game crashed.

Does anyone know what to do? I already restarted my computer and I opened the game as an adminstrator. I really don't know what to do now...

replies.body:
Hey LuziferSonozaki,

An antivirus/antimalware application may be interfering with League of Legends' ability to run properly. Please check to ensure that League of Legends is added as an exception to any antivirus applications you may have running, including AdAware. Let me know if you're still having issues afterwards.
